title: Was Buddy Ebsen the original tin man "the Wizard of Oz "?
subtitle: The guy who was due to play Tin Woodman in MGM 1939 was actually Ray Bulger.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Paddy Epsen was to play Tin Woodman in 1939 from the Oz Wizard film, but he had to be replaced after the aluminum makeup used with his uniform made him seriously ill.
